医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究表明，心理健康对健康老龄化至关重要《自然人类行为》杂志上的一项研究发现，心理健康对健康老龄化有因果影响，与社会经济地位无关，更好的心理健康与改善老龄化结果有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mental-well-being-crucial-for-healthy-aging-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mental-well-being-crucial-for-healthy-aging-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e5b631b-eed1-4d53-9d04-6a2a9182a135 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Mental well-being crucial for healthy aging, new study reveals
研究表明疫苗可以降低长期感染新冠病毒的风险，尤其是对于那些已有疾病的人《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版的一项研究发现，女性和患有心血管疾病的个人更有可能长期感染新冠病毒，但接种疫苗，尤其是多次接种疫苗，可以显着降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-shows-vaccines-cut-long-COVID-risk-special-for-those-with-preexisting-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-shows-vaccines-cut-long-COVID-risk-special-for-those-with-preexisting-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aff61b8-3044-44cd-ae0d-68f835fbe804 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:24:00 -0400 Study shows vaccines cut long COVID risk, especially for those with preexisting conditions
研究揭示乳腺癌患者的持久生活质量不平等在健康方面，乳腺癌女性在各个层面都存在不平等：预防、筛查、诊断、治疗和生存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-reveals- permanent-quality-of-life-inequities-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-reveals- permanent-quality-of-life-inequities-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac9f85a-8cd0-4792-88bc-3586cba2b15e Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Study reveals lasting quality of life inequities in breast cancer patients
研究：抗炎药塞来昔布对 PIK3CA 突变结肠癌患者有益对 3 期结肠癌患者随机临床试验数据的分析发现，与没有突变的患者相比，术后服用抗炎​​药塞来昔布的 PIK3CA 突变患者的寿命和无病生存期均显着延长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Anti-lingual-drug-celecoxib-benefits-PIK3CA-mutated-colon-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Anti-lingual-drug-celecoxib-benefits-PIK3CA-mutated-colon-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfa74edd-0dbb-4614-a0ca-211503d357f6 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:12:00 -0400 Study: Anti-inflammatory drug celecoxib benefits PIK3CA-mutated colon cancer patients
昆士兰大学研究旨在减少青少年危及生命的过敏反应昆士兰大学的一个项目旨在让被诊断患有危及生命的食物过敏的澳大利亚儿童在青少年时期更加安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/UQ-study-aims-to-reduce-life-throne-allergic-reactions-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/UQ-study-aims-to-reduce-life-throne-allergic-reactions-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c35822e-ed2a-46f5-9594-3ccfddda4d4a Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:07:00 -0400 UQ study aims to reduce life-threatening allergic reactions in adolescents
德克萨斯农工大学的研究人员研究太空旅行对眼睛健康的影响随着太空旅行变得越来越普遍，考虑太空飞行和重力变化对人体的影响非常重要。在 Ana Diaz Artiles 博士的带领下，德克萨斯农工大学的研究人员正在研究其中的一些影响，特别是对眼睛的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Texas-AM-researchers-study-impact-of-space-travel-on-eye-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Texas-AM-researchers-study-impact-of-space-travel-on-eye-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943b49f8-9a21-4f3a-8d7a-1c25bc916f02 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:03:49 -0400 Texas A&M researchers study impact of space travel on eye health
罗格斯大学健康研究揭示了临终关怀出院导致负面结果的关键因素罗格斯健康中心的研究人员表示，离开临终关怀中心的黑人患者和在临终关怀中心短暂停留的患者在出院后入院的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Rutgers-Health-study-reveals-key-factors-in-hospice-discharges-leading-to-male-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Rutgers-Health-study-reveals-key-factors-in-hospice-discharges-leading-to-male-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9005732b-a887-42b6-8cef-75e807411f2c Tue, 18 Jun 2024 22:57:47 -0400 Rutgers Health study reveals key factors in hospice discharges leading to negative outcomes
新的骨髓图谱提供了细胞功能和组织的详细视图尽管研究揭示了有关血细胞在骨髓中如何发挥作用的许多细节，但存在于该空间中的其他细胞的工作仍然是一个相对神秘的事情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-bone-marrow-atlas-offers-detailed-view-of-cell-function-and-organization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-bone-marrow-atlas-offers-detailed-view-of-cell-function-and-organization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cea92ba-1b7c-47ed-84b5-3b9edd5f13f5 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 22:51:00 -0400 New bone marrow atlas offers detailed view of cell function and organization
会阴侧切术可降低初次当妈妈的人遭受严重会阴创伤的风险对于需要真空辅助分娩的初次母亲，在阴道和肛门开口之间的组织中进行侧向会阴切开术（成角度的切割）可将产科肛门括约肌损伤（外阴和肛门之间的一种严重会阴创伤）的风险降低一半以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Lateral-episiotomy-reduces-risk-of-severe-perineal-trauma-in-first-time-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Lateral-episiotomy-reduces-risk-of-severe-perineal-trauma-in-first-time-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34c956cd-6142-4d28-92da-35877f47a413 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 22:47:00 -0400 Lateral episiotomy reduces risk of severe perineal trauma in first-time mothers
GPT-4 提高临床试验筛选准确性并降低成本研究人员评估了 RECTIFIER 系统，这是一种支持 RAG 的 GPT-4，该系统在筛选临床试验参与者的心力衰竭方面表现出较高的准确性和效率，在某些方面优于传统方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/GPT-4-enhances-clinical-trial-screening-accuracy-and-cuts-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/GPT-4-enhances-clinical-trial-screening-accuracy-and-cuts-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8f8437c-3a37-4dc4-b7d2-c76b95dcf034 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 22:09:00 -0400 GPT-4 enhances clinical trial screening accuracy and cuts costs
